column5: My name is joe.i have tried to commit suicide twice. I suffer from depression. My email address is tabaskojoe248@gmail.com. u can't live for somebody else. U must live for yourself. I am not scared to die. I live in hope that things will improve. It's a battle everyday. Dont waist your time for someone else. U either must live or die. Contact me for support. Would love to hear from you regards Joe
